description:
Extend your riding season indefinitely with this performance-oriented shoe from 45NRTH, a dedicated cold-weather cycling apparel company. Purpose-built for riding fast in cold, wet conditions, the Ragnarok boasts a durable upper backed with a waterproof-breathable membrane that keeps you dry on the wettest days. An adjustable neoprene cuff provides added protection and unhindered ankle mobility, while the BOA® closure system lets you quickly dial in the fit. A stiffened midsole ensures efficient power transfer as you stomp the pedals and the winter-specific outsole contains micro-glass inserts designed to grip ice. The Ragnarok is built on a wide performance last, providing a stable platform whether you're ripping winter trails, training for cyclocross season or powering through your daily commute.

  • Hardwearing synthetic leather upper is perforated for added breathability
  • Waterproof-breathable membrane construction
  • Neoprene ankle cuff offers protection against the elements without compromising mobility
  • BOA® closure system offers a refined fit and easy adjustment on the fly
  • Nylon composite midsole offers support, impact resistance and efficient power transfer
  • Protective toecap
  • Rubber outsole features micro-glass inserts for grip on icy surfaces
  • Built on a wide performance last for a comfortable, stable platform
  • Compatible with 2-bolt SPD cleat interfaces
  • Reflective details help keep you seen
  • 45NRTH recommends these shoes for down to -4°C
name: 45NRTH Ragnarok Winter Cycling Shoes - Unisex
